title: I wish I'd knew. Motorcycle Logo Font
content:
Hi All!

Sorry for the wishy washy subject line.  
I just don't know how to classify this font.

Can anyone help?

Logo needs to be reproduced in its entirety and go to print by Friday.

Thanks a bunch!

Font: 

 Sexsmith 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317120150/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Screen Shot 2014-09-09 at 6.01.01 PM.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317120150/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202014-09-09%20at%206.01.01%20PM.png) | 118.45 KB |
author: annag

comments.content:
You beat me to it, Fivos. If you need a commercial license (server, apps, etc.):  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/typodermic/sexsmith/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317120150/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typodermic/sexsmith/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/typodermic/sexsmith/")

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317120150im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Sexsmith_3982.png)
This forum is amazing, YOU GUYS ARE AMAZING :-) Thank you so much. My client will be very happy.
